errors.error_description: An incorrect note has been added stating that the package requires Python 2.7, which is misleading as the library supports modern Python versions.
correction_candidates: Remove the note about Python 2.7 compatibility.
Change the note to specify Python 3.6+ is required.
Change the note to state the package is compatible with both Python 2 and 3.
errors.golden_answer: Remove the note about Python 2.7 compatibility.
